data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint John.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint John, Virgin Islands, U.S.
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Saint John with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: There are 4,200 people living in the state of Saint John. Only about 1,024 might be believers.
Jesus, make the 2,933 people in the state of Saint John who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cruz Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cruz Bay, Saint John, Virgin Islands, U.S..
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Saint John, Virgin Islands, U.S..
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Saint John to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Saint John unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Saint John
location.cities_list: Cruz Bay, The Valley, Blowing Point Village, Sandy Ground Village, West End Village
location.cities_list_w_pop: Cruz Bay (2,743), The Valley (2,035), Blowing Point Village (942), Sandy Ground Village (274), West End Village
